languages.text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks with heavy weapons deal +50% damage until the end of turn.

The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

languages.text:
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高30点。
如果装备者在前一个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}没有移动过，则重武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程攻击{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%，效果持续至回合结束。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
装备者无视重型武器的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}要求。
如果装备者在前一个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}没有移动过，则重武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击造成的伤害提高50%，效果持续至回合结束。

装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高30点。
如果装备者在前一个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}没有移动过，则重武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%，效果持续至回合结束。

languages.text:
Персонаж получает +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
Если персонаж не двигался в свой прошлый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционные атаки{/g} тяжелым оружием наносят на 50% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до конца хода.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж может игнорировать требования к значению Силы для использования тяжелого оружия.
Если персонаж не двигался в свой прошлый ход, его дистанционные атаки тяжелым оружием наносят на 50% больше урона до конца хода.

Персонаж может игнорировать требования к значению Силы для использования тяжелого оружия.
Если персонаж не двигался в свой прошлый ход, его дистанционные атаки тяжелым оружием наносят на 50% больше урона до конца хода.

languages.text:
使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}+30を与える。
使用者が直前の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で移動しなかった場合、ターン終了時までヘヴィウェポンを使った{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠距離攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%増える。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
使用者はヘヴィウェポンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}条件を無視する。
使用者が直前の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で移動しなかった場合、ターン終了時までヘヴィウェポンを使った{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃のダメージが50％増える。

使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}+30を与える。
使用者が直前の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で移動しなかった場合、ターン終了時までヘヴィウェポンを使った{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%増える。

languages.text:
El portador gana +30 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
Si el portador no se ha movido el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} anterior, sus {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g} con armas pesadas causan +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} hasta finalizar su turno.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
El portador ignora los requisitos de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} de las armas pesadas.
Si el portador no se ha movido el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} anterior, sus ataques a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} con armas pesadas causan +50 % de daño hasta finalizar su turno.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
Hat sich der Träger im vorherigen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht bewegt, verursachen seine {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampf-Angriffe{/g} mit schweren Waffen bis zum Ende des Zuges +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}-Anforderungen schwerer Waffen.
Hat sich der Träger im vorigen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht bewegt. verursachen seine {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe mit schweren Waffen +50 % Schaden bis zum Ende des Zuges.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} précédent, les {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g} qu'il exécute avec des armes lourdes infligent +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} jusqu'à la fin du tour.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur ignore les exigences de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} relatives aux armes lourdes.
Si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} précédent, les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} qu'il mène à l'aide d'armes lourdes infligent +50 % de dégâts jusqu'à la fin du tour.

L'utilisateur ignore les exigences de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} relatives aux armes lourdes.
Si l'utilisateur ne s'est pas déplacé au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} précédent, les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} qu'il mène à l'aide d'armes lourdes infligent +50 % de dégâts jusqu'à la fin du tour.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliğine +30 kazanır.
Giyen kişi, bir önceki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} hareket etmemişse ağır silahla yaptığı {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılar{/g} +%50 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu etki, turun sonuna dek sürer.

If the wearer has not moved the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} with heavy weapons deal +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the turn.
